snippet: If the Obama administration’s reduction in military aid doesn’t work, more cuts may be necessary.
abstract: Editorial contends that if Egypt's military continues to trample on country's political opposition despite reduction in United States military aid, then Pres Obama will have to consider further cuts; warns Pres Obama that acquiescing to powerful Egyptian generals will only bring further instability to region.
lead_paragraph: If the Obama administration’s reduction in military aid doesn’t work, more cuts may be necessary.
